name: The Looping Loops
description:
This game is a product of the Ludum Dare 47 with the theme stuck in a loop.

A 2-4 players battle royal racing game where the players try to stay on top of a rewinding cassette tape until the end of the song! Dodge obstacles and jump on ramps to ensure your survival, but beware! To close to either tips of the tape and you might fall!

2 player minimum, both can play on the keyboard, for 4 players controllers are required.

CONTROLS:

P1:

A and D: Move left or right;

Space: Accelerate

Escape: Force end roun

F1: Close game

P2:

Right and Left arrow: Move in those directions

Right Control: Accelerate

Controllers:

Left analog stick: Move left and right

South button: Accelerate
